actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the last school day in April as "National Pledge Allegiance to Our Flag Day".

summary.text: Requests and authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating the last schoolday in April as "National Pledge Allegiance to Our Flag Day" in recognition of our national heritage as exemplified by our flag.

titles.title: Joint resolution requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the last school day in April as "National Pledge Allegiance to Our Flag Day".
